operation.search: SELECT a.id_attach, a.id_folder, a.filename, a.file_hash FROM {db_prefix}attachments AS a LEFT JOIN {db_prefix}messages AS m ON (m.id_msg = a.id_msg) WHERE a.id_attach BETWEEN {int:substep} AND {int:substep} + 499 AND a.id_member = {int:no_member} AND a.id_msg != {int:no_msg} AND m.id_msg IS NULL
operation.add: SELECT a.id_attach, a.id_folder, a.filename, a.file_hash FROM {db_prefix}attachments AS a LEFT JOIN {db_prefix}messages AS m ON (m.id_msg = a.id_msg) LEFT JOIN {db_prefix}helpdesk_attachments AS hda ON (hda.id_attach = a.id_attach) LEFT JOIN {db_prefix}helpdesk_ticket_replies AS hdtr ON (hdtr.id_msg = hda.id_msg) WHERE a.id_attach BETWEEN {int:substep} AND {int:substep} + 499 AND a.id_member = {int:no_member} AND a.id_msg != {int:no_msg} AND m.id_msg IS NULL AND hdtr.id_msg IS NULL
